nodes.text: Fort Divin was a spaceport that was located on the planet Ord Antalaha. It was named after the first lieutenant to command the planet.

Fort Divin was the only spaceport on Ord Antalaha. It dealt with a lot of illegal traffic and had a thriving used starship market. The port lacked facilities to deal with any ships bigger than a CR90 corvette and mainly dealt with converted freighters and patrol ships.
